notifications_helper: Configure services to be notified when the AI detects a NEW alert condition (isAlert=true). Notifications are sent only once per new alert.
license_key_helper: Enter your Pro key to unlock LTM features. (Test: TEST-PRO-KEY)
min_days_for_baseline_helper: Minimum number of days required before the baseline becomes active (Default: 7).
ltm_stb_window_days_helper: Timeframe used for detecting immediate anomalies (1-30, Default: 14).
ltm_ltb_window_days_helper: Maximum timeframe used for detecting gradual changes (30-180, Default: 60).
ltm_drift_check_interval_hours_helper: How often STB and LTB are compared (1-168, Default: 24h).
table_log_duplicates_tooltip: If checked, EVERY update from this sensor is logged, even if the value has not changed (e.g., for presence detectors).
living_context_helper: e.g., 'Resident is 80 years old, mobility impaired' or 'Dog present'. This info greatly helps the AI.
msg_api_key_empty: Please enter an API Key first.
ltm_pro_feature_required: The Long-Term Memory Dashboard is only available in the Pro version. Please enter a valid license key in the configuration tab.
ltm_no_data_available: No Daily Digests available yet. Data will appear here after the first successful LTM compression.
ltm_drift_status_unavailable: Drift status currently unavailable or still learning.
ltm_chart_legend_info: Hover over the bars for details.
ltm_chart_legend_tooltip: Shows the AI-determined activity level for each day based on the compressed summaries.
